title: Train Station Leader

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: The Train Station Leader may give a player a ticket, letting them ride the train for the rest of the game, giving them invincible defense when they choose to ride the train, they may use their ability while riding once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Roleblock, Control, Redirect immune.

You may not ride the train, even if redirected into giving yourself a ticket.
Players may leave the train at any time; but will need another ticket to re-enter.

desc:
Post 1010
At the start of day 1, all players will be notified a train has entered the town.
